The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 01 August is 57,112 (6,610.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 July, there were 2,225 new confirmed cases (257.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 July, there were 4,298 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 48% (2,073 fewer cases).
